data.lyric:
[ti:Hold On]
[ar:Adele]
[al:30]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hold On - Adele
[00:00.08]Lyrics by：Adele Adkins/Dean Josiah Cover
[00:00.27]Composed by：Adele Adkins/Dean Josiah Cover
[00:00.46]Hold on
[00:07.29]
[00:11.70]You are still strong
[00:19.05]
[00:23.22]Love will soon come
[00:30.50]
[00:33.91]Just hold hold on
[00:41.90]
[00:47.06]Oh what have I done yet again
[00:52.57]Have I not learned anything
[00:57.64]
[00:58.67]I don't want to live in chaos
[01:04.28]It's like a ride that I want to get off
[01:09.79]It's hard to hold onto who I am
[01:15.65]When I'm stumbling in the dark for a hand
[01:21.39]I am so tired of battling with myself with no chance to win
[01:33.02]Hold on
[01:39.68]
[01:40.27]Let time be patient
[01:43.80]You are still strong
[01:51.93]Let pain be gracious
[01:55.52]Love will soon come
[02:03.07]
[02:06.75]Just hold hold on
[02:15.85]
[02:19.39]I swear to God I am such a mess
[02:24.88]
[02:25.51]The harder that I try I regress
[02:30.52]
[02:31.15]I'm my own worst enemy
[02:36.72]Right now I truly hate being me
[02:42.47]Every day feels like the road I'm on
[02:47.85]
[02:48.37]Might just open up and swallow me whole
[02:53.24]
[02:54.06]How do I feel so mighty small
[02:59.27]
[02:59.80]When I'm struggling to feel at all
[03:04.75]Just hold on
[03:11.79]
[03:13.05]Let time be patient
[03:16.69]You are still strong
[03:24.53]Let pain be gracious
[03:35.63]
[03:39.07]Just hold on
[03:47.48]
[03:51.20]Sometimes loneliness is the only rest we get
[03:58.35]
[04:00.17]Just hold on just hold on
[04:02.72]And the emptiness actually let's us forget
[04:11.87]Just hold on just hold on
[04:13.90]Sometimes forgiveness is easiest in secret
[04:24.80]
[04:25.71]So just hold on
[04:35.62]
[04:36.59]Let time be patient
[04:40.43]You are still strong
[04:47.12]
[04:48.30]Let pain be gracious
[04:51.50]
[04:52.07]Love will soon come baby
[04:59.07]
[05:00.16]If you just hold on
[05:03.70]Hold on hold on hold on hold on
[05:10.62]
[05:11.31]Just let time be patient
[05:15.99]
[05:17.14]'Cause you're still strong you're still strong
[05:23.06]
[05:23.88]Just be gracious
[05:26.54]'Cause love will soon come
[05:34.84]If you just hold on
[05:38.13]
[05:44.68]Just be patient just be patient
[05:50.28]You just hold on you just hold on
[05:55.44]
[05:56.05]You just hold on
[05:58.32]
[05:58.91]Just hold on just hold on
